cab.content: (THIS DOCUMBHT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BSITAHHIC MAJESTY1S GrOVERHMSHT)SLJLP-JLJLCiEISBlUBBMPLOiIiaBT INSURANCE COMMITTEE. Hote by the Secretary, Cabinet.As a matter of urgency the Prime Minister has requested the following Committee to examine the proposals relative to Unemployment Insurance contained in a Memorandum (C.P.169 (24)) to be circulated by the Minister of Labour and to report thereon to the Cabinet as soon as practicable.The Chancellor of the Exchequer, or in his absence The Financial Secretary to the Treasury.The President of the Board of trade the Minister of health the Secretary for scotland the President of the Board, cf education the Lord AdvocateMr. T. jones mr. RvB. Howorth will act as Joint Secretaries to the Committee.-The first Meeting of the Committee will be held in the Ministers' Conference Room, House of Commons, on Tuelsday, March 11th, 1924, at 4.15 p.m.The Minister of Labour(in the Chair)and(Signed)M.P.A. KAHKEY*Secretary, Cabinet.2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W.I.,10th March, 1924.
